name: Who let the dogs out ?
description:
Immerse yourself in this story told like a reddit horror thread.  It may be based on a true story of a friend of friend.

(Don't forget to put on full screen, see bottom right corner)

  • Play with x, e button  and with mouse

Made by me in approximately 17 hours for TriJam#104: Who let the dog out ?

  • 6 hours for GameDesign, ideas and dialog
  • At least 3 hours struggling with Gdevelop (this is my third game with it)
  • 8 hours to actually code the game, and create the different design

Even if I don't publish it on time, it was still a good experience !
